# Restaurant Status Checker API

## Project Overview
Go REST API for checking restaurant opening status by scraping Wongnai website.

## Technology Stack
- Language: Go (Golang)
- Framework: Gin Web Framework
- Web Scraping: colly
- Target: Wongnai restaurant pages

## API Endpoints
- GET /api/v1/status/:restaurantId - Check restaurant opening status

## Development Guidelines
- Use Go modules for dependency management
- Follow Go standard project layout
- Implement proper error handling
- Use environment variables for configuration
